file_content.text: [This appears to be an advanced-model serving droid. It shouldn't be difficult to add the poison into its drink dispenser.]
[Poison the droid's drinks.]
Sorry--Master Tlan must have called the droid. I hope that's not a problem.
I was just finishing up.
No problem.
Great. Hope it worked out.
No rush. I'll take another look when it gets back.
I can wait.
That's fine with me.
Whatever you were doing with that droid, please leave it alone. Master Tlan's called it.
I was just curious. Didn't mean any harm.
Sorry.
That droid is for Master Tlan, and only Master Tlan. Don't bother it from now on.
I'm sure Master Tlan will enjoy his drink.
This should be interesting.
I'm sure he will.
I'm just staying occupied. Don't get touchy.
Enough already.
Netula! Netula! I can't breathe... I need my medical droids! I need them now!
Master, you have two medical droids already.
Idiot girl. I know when there's something wrong with me. I can't breathe. My tongue is swelling--there was something in my drink!
You're right, Tlan. You've just been poisoned.
I'm responsible.
Let me in--I'm a doctor.
I can help you.
Who the blazes are you?
Hello, Tlan. Sorry for the trouble--seemed the fastest way to get your attention.
I thought you'd notice that.
You did this? How did you get in here?
I'm sorry, master. This is the woman who wanted to meet with you.
I'm sorry, master. She came to look at the droids.
I'm sorry, master. She just came in and started playing with the serving droid. I couldn't stop her!
I'm sorry, master. This is the man who wanted to meet with you.
I'm sorry, master. He came to look at the droids.
I'm sorry, master. He just came in and started playing with the serving droid. I couldn't stop him!
You pathetic creature. I've told you that I have enemies--and this is proof! This woman is trying to kill me!
You pathetic creature. I've told you that I have enemies--and this is proof! This man is trying to kill me!
I'm so sorry. I had no idea...
You've got my undivided attention, blast you. What do you want?
I need to know about Synchet's link to terrorism.
It's about your business.
It's not--it wasn't like that.
Ever hear of a genetic modification program called "Cyclone"?
Tell me about this serum.
What? I'm not a geneticist.
You're supporting an uprising against the Empire.
Terrorist scum.
What? No! Do I look like someone who cares about politics?
I don't have any answers for you. Now help me, before I'm a corpse!
You know something. Talk to me, Tlan.
Liar.
Work with me. Try to remember back to Synchet's bankruptcy.
Please, I need your help.
Talk first, then the antidote.
I'm in no hurry.
You--blast you.
Back when I was with Synchet, the company was failing. The war bankrupted us. We had to sell everything.
One of our subsidiaries developed medical technologies--kolto tanks, rancor stims, Cyclone, that sort of thing. But the group that bought it wasn't interested in profit.
What were they interested in?
Go on.
Something seemed wrong, but you sold them the company anyway?
You dealt with this group?
Of course we did. Why not?
Maybe you'll earn the antidote after all.
You're making me happy.
They used fake names, paid for everything in cash.
They only cared about the technology, not the business. Yes, I knew it was strange, and no, I didn't--didn't...
Get in there and help him! Or do you just plan to let him die?
I'll bring him the antidote. Open the door.
Not yet.
I'll make sure your boss doesn't expire.
Don't worry.
He's not going to die until I'm finished.
There's more I can do to him.
[Leave the droid alone.]
Speaker = not master. Access denied.
